instinct_candidates.title: Tile generation uses bash script

instinct_candidates.title: App.jsx was heavily refactored
instinct_candidates.trigger: When working on the frontend React app or debugging UI issues
instinct_candidates.action: Note that App.jsx was significantly simplified (307 lines removed). Component logic was likely extracted into separate component files like LayerPanel.jsx. Check frontend/src/components/ for extracted components.

instinct_candidates.title: Pipeline has 4 numbered steps
instinct_candidates.trigger: When working on the data pipeline or Makefile targets
instinct_candidates.action: The pipeline follows numbered steps: 01_download.py, 02_clip_arizona.py, 03_enrich.py, 04_generate_tiles.sh. Steps 1-3 are Python (use uv), step 4 is bash. The Makefile orchestrates these.

instinct_candidates.title: Project uses Makefile for orchestration
instinct_candidates.trigger: When running pipeline commands or looking for build/run targets
instinct_candidates.action: Check the Makefile for available targets. The Makefile was recently updated (13 lines changed) and orchestrates the pipeline steps.
